author: Pred√§
install_msg:
Thank you for installing the serverinfo cog !
Don't forget to `[p]load serverinfo` !

Important note : You will need to use `[p]reload general` command to bring back original serverinfo command if you unload this cog.
name: ServerInfo
short: Replace serverinfo command with more details.
description: Replace original serverinfo command with more details, about users and server.
